data.text: @PayneInsider @alynch1788 @Gotti_Film Trust but verify

@fishinlawyer @alynch1788 @Gotti_Film No faith in my review, Joseph?  I'm the guy that awarded Spotlight movie of the year before it was nominated + told folks Wind River was the most underrated movie of '17 before it won Best Overlooked Film.  #ComeOnMan https://t.co/tIMKDY5FZr
@alynch1788 @PayneInsider @Gotti_Film Let me know if you get a chance
@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film @alynch1788   Have you seen it yet?

@PayneInsider @marcsudbury4 @Gotti_Film I'll be watching it... I'm actually really looking forward to it. @mrkevinconnolly is no slouch. My favourite Gotti movie to date is from 1996 with Armand Assante, I'm expecting 2018 to be as good and then some.
@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film Hey Payne. This movie can’t be as bad as Holi her in the tookus incident in the bathroom right?
@GusChiggins19 @Gotti_Film Ha.  Billy Walsh has quite the role in Gotti
@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film Dude. Come on. Medellin was Billy Walsh’s fault. Sure KC could have maintained a tighter leash but that’s on Walsh
@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film @RandyMickens  haha
@JoeyPaganelli @Gotti_Film @ToddFuhrman @BetTheBoardPod listeners must know me well if they start providing warnings of how many pages a book is

@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film @ToddFuhrman Haha, I’m about 60% complete. It’s a 700 page book. Starts in the early 1900’s and I’m currently in the Gotti years. So far, it’s been really good and extremely informational.
@WstcoastTycoon @Gotti_Film Appreciate the @AEtv documentary tip, Keegan
@PayneInsider @JoeyPaganelli @Gotti_Film trying to figure out book reccos for Payne has become a major source of consternation; I know if I flop the first one I lose all credibility going forward

@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film I said the same thing! It was so bad. Not a good role for Travolta. He was terrible. The Gotti movie made in 1996 was wayyyy better. A really good movie. The A&E 4 part doc that came out recently about the son is really good, also.
@JoeyPaganelli @Gotti_Film Tough to do, Joey.  Waiting on book recommendations from @ToddFuhrman, but Five Families just jumped to the top of the list
@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film That’s so disappointing. I’m reading Five Families right now and the last 50 pages or so have focused on Gotti and Gravano. How can you mess up a storyline that great??
@NotBillyWalters @Gotti_Film Love Armand Assante, wish he had a wee bit larger role in American Gangster
@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film Gotti 96’ (HBO) is the gold standard for Gotti bio pics
@TwoToneMikey @Gotti_Film Haven't walked out of a movie yet, but came close for Gotti and Blade Runner 2049 (took nap instead)
@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film I love that you fit Entourage references in where ever you can I absolutely heart that show I still watch it to this day Payne.
@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film me and wife woulda walked out if we had not ordered food.
@Franko097 @Gotti_Film Didn't see Isles but heard similar.  Not a Travolta guy either, but when someone puts 8-years into something, I was willing to give it a shot
@PayneInsider @Gotti_Film That Isles 30 for 30 wasn’t half of what it could have been either
